pageContext.claim: “Andrew Gillam wants to throw open your borders to drug dealers, human traffickers, gang members, and criminal aliens. And Gillam supports deadly sanctuary cities. He wants to abolish ICE. And he signed an extreme left-wing pledge that supported an end to all borders. Oh, that's great. That's what we want.”
pageContext.analysis: Some Democrats have been calling to abolish U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, but it’s not a widely held position and some Democrats say the agency should be reformed, not abolished. Gillam stands with these Democrats. In any case, ICE is only one of several agencies tasked with immigration enforcement.
